title: THIS JOURNEY IS YOURS. PACE IT, OWN IT, PROGRESS WITH PURPOSE
description: Rohan, your steady commitment to mastering complex concepts like nonlinear functions and the nuances of form and structure in reading is the quiet force driving your progress. Your resilience in tackling challenging material—even when immediate results aren’t visible—reflects a deep, purposeful work ethic that will serve you well beyond the SAT. As you refine your understanding of sentence boundaries and vocabulary in context, remember that adaptability is your ally; small adjustments in strategy can unlock new levels of clarity and efficiency. Celebrate each milestone, no matter how subtle, and use visual progress markers to see how far you’ve come. Pairing your persistence with thoughtful reflection and openness to fine-tuning will accelerate your growth. Keep trusting the process—your consistent effort is building the foundation for the breakthrough score you’re aiming for.
